summary: There\'s no bed to sleep in Bards College, right? Now there is.
descriptionHtml:
[Description]

Do you know that there\'s no bed to sleep for you even if you are a member of Bards College? Now there is! This mod adds 2 safe container and a bed for player but you have to be a member of the Bards College to use them.

[Installing]
Put the file to your Skyrim/Data directory.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2553727]Check My Other Mods[/url]

Enjoy!
author: hasanalicik
